title: Why can't we have different announcers?
body: Like, just cause DotA has it, doesn't mean we can't. Announcer packs bring a different sort of diversity to the game and it would be awesome to have different ones at our disposal. I never liked using 3rd party stuff to change the announcer in League.** Plz Rito.**

replies.body: I wish that Australian guy with a lisp would just stop.. I can't decipher half of his words..
